Elliot, M.C., M.P.Captain w. Wedgwood Benn, D.S.O., M,P.I enclose the cards signed by the gentlemen in question.4, Wilton Street, Grosvenor Place S.W. 1.4th June, 1920.Sir,CP. 372.may i have the honour to be, Sir,Your obedient Servant,( Sgd,) WTNTERTON.Sir Eaurloe Hankey, G.C.B., fi Cabinet office,etc.2, y^iitehall Gardens,S.W. 1.
